server package¶

Submodules¶

server.exception_handler module¶

server.exception_handler.process_exception(exception)[source]¶

Translates exceptions to error strings

longer explanation: return SNODROP Exception: <string representation of exception> for handled exceptions or SNODROP Unhandled Exception!!:<string representation of exception> for unhandled ones

Parameters:exception – The exception to process
Returns:An error string
server.exception_handler.str_wrap_exceptions(orig_function)[source]¶

Function wrapper to catch any exceptions and return an error string using process_exception()

Parameters:orig_function – The function to wrap
Returns:A logically equivilent function, that returns an error string rather than raising exceptions.

server.smellie_server module¶

class server.smellie_server.SmellieServer(port)[source]¶

XML-RPC Protocol server that exposes a list of functions to external calls

register()[source]¶

Register methods with internal server, after wrapping with exception_handler.str_wrap_exceptions()

serve_forever()[source]¶

Listen indefinitely for function calls to exectute

Module contents¶

Code related to the XML-RPC server that runs on SNODROP
